pullRequest.title: Fix swagger ui payload not getting sent error in POST request
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue
fixes wso2/product-apim#7336
Methodology
Using swagger-ui-react library which resolves the payload getting lost for OASv3 definitions ,instead of swagger-ui library and remove the custom implementations needed for the previous library.
